talents.name: THE LIGHTER YOU ARE
talents.description: When you spend Skullduggery to move, you may stand up from prone or disengage for free.

talents.name: CHEAT FATE
talents.description:
1/Session
Ignore an Omen you've flipped or a Joker flipped targeting you. Use the next card instead.
-or-
Discard Skullduggery to treat the Omen as if it were a Joker or vise versa.

talents.name: OPPORTUNIST
talents.description: You can use any skill card to make opportunity attacks.

talents.name: DISGUISE
talents.description: You my disguise yourself as though you spent an edge.

talents.name: THE HARDER THEY FALL
talents.description: Whenever you Trip an enemy, flip damage.

talents.name: SNEAK ATTACK
talents.description: Deal +1 damage against enemies that targeted someone other than you last round

talents.name: REACTIVE PARRY
talents.description: If you are wielding 2 weapons, you may spend a skullduggery card to block an attack even if you haven't readied a block.

talents.name: QUICK CHANGE
talents.description: You may spend a Skullduggery card to change into or out of a disguise in a single turn.

talents.name: FIND YOUR MOMENT
talents.description: When you engage by attacking with Skullduggery, flip an extra card of damage.

talents.name: RIPOSTE
talents.description: After you block, you may gain 1 Strain to make a free attack.

talents.name: TWIN STRIKE
talents.description: When you discard a Skullduggery to make a dual wield attack, the extra attack costs 1 less strain than it normally would.

talents.name: POUND AND GROUND
talents.description: If you attack an enemy you have grappled, you may also knock them prone.

talents.name: MASTER KEY
talents.description: Athletics you spend to break open a lock/door counts as 2 cards. 1/session, as part of a move, you may spend an Athletics card to make a person-sized hole in a wall that wall must not be reinforced with metal or magic, and be less that 1 foot thick.

talents.name: FOOTWORK
talents.description: The first time you spend an Athletics card each round, you can move 1 zone as part of the same action.

talents.name: CULL THE WEAK
talents.description: You can attack minions as a free action.

talents.name: PAIN TOLERANCE
talents.description: Whenever you take damage, you may spend Athletics to reduce that damage by your Exhaustion.

talents.name: ADROIT OPPORTUNITY
talents.description: When you make an opportunity attack, you can draw a replacement skill card.

talents.name: HOUND PREY
talents.description: After making an attack of opportunity, you may move 1 zone with the triggering enemy. You are not engaged.

talents.name: WHILE THE IRON IS HOT
talents.description:
1/Session
You may spend Athletics to take an appropriate action. This action can be taken at any time (even interrupting another's action).

talents.name: BLOCK EXPERTISE
talents.description: If you use Athletics to block, treat your block value as double.

talents.name: REACTIVE BLOCK
talents.description: If you have a shield, you may spend an athletics card to block an attack even if you haven't readied a block.

talents.name: BEYOND LIMITS
talents.description: Take 1 Strain. You may spend any skill card as though it were Athletics.

talents.name: CLEAVE
talents.description: When you attack with Athletics, you may take 1 Strain to attack each enemy you're engaged with.

talents.name: ONE SHALL STAND
talents.description: After calculating Barrier at the start of your turn, gain +1 Barrier for each enemy you're engaged with.

talents.name: INNER FIRE
talents.description: You may discard Focus and take 1 Strain. This counts as paying 1 Anima of your choice.

talents.name: CONCENTRATION
talents.description: Any time a success involving you requires more than 1 card, you may play a focus card as long as another card is justifying the success.

talents.name: ELEMENTARY
talents.description: When you spend Focus to investigate, you may piece together unrealistically specific characteristics of an individual or object that's been present in your environment.

talents.name: FOCUSED STRIKE
talents.description: You may use Focus to attack. If you do, and crit, you may choose your crit effect.

talents.name: FOCUSED PERSEVERANCE
talents.description:
Gain +1 Strain threshold.

1/Session
Reduce your Exhaustion by 1

talents.name: GRIT
talents.description:
1/Session
Anytime you would be forced to, Discard, Mill, or Burn a card you may gain 2 strain instead.

talents.name: SENSE WEAKNESS
talents.description: When an enemy flips an Omen, your next damage flip against that enemy crits.

talents.name: ANIMATED STRIKE
talents.description: Spend anima when you attack for 2 extra damage of that type. Double it if unarmed.

talents.name: GREATER INNER FIRE
talents.description:
You may mill a rune and gain 3 Strain to gain 2 Anima of your choice. 

This should be a Vitalist talent.

talents.name: LASER FOCUS
talents.description:
1/Session
You may gain 2 Strain to act as though you spent Focus.

talents.name: HARDENED WILL
talents.description: You may spend a Focus card to nullify a mental ability attempting to be used on you.

talents.name: FLOW STATE
talents.description: The first time you spend Anima each turn while Channeling, draw a skill card.

talents.name: INEXORABLE WILL
talents.description:
1/Session
Reduce your Exhaustion to 1.

Problematic with Knowledge talent for gaining extra uses.

talents.name: CENTERED BREATHS
talents.description: Increase your strain threshold by 2 for each effect you're channeling.

talents.name: RITUALIST
talents.description:
1/Session
When you're able to focus without distraction for 10 minutes, you can look through your deck and choose your spell.

talents.name: PARALLEL PROCESSING
talents.description: You may Channel an extra effect concurrently.

talents.name: ONE STEP AHEAD
talents.description: Play with the top of your skill deck revealed.

talents.name: EUREKA!
talents.description: Whenever you flip a Joker, draw a card.

talents.name: STROKE OF GENIUS
talents.description: 1/session, you may use a Knowledge card as if it were any skill card.

talents.name: FORETHOUGHT
talents.description:
1/Session
You may retroactively have used or prepared mundane gear without spending Edge.

talents.name: PLAN B
talents.description: If you have a Knowledge card in your hand, you may swap it for the top card of your deck.

talents.name: MEMORY PALACE
talents.description: At the beginning of each session, you may pick a card from either of your decks and set it aside this session. You may spend it as if it were in your hand.

talents.name: CHANGE GEARS
talents.description: 1/session, you may tuck your hand and draw up to your hand size

talents.name: TRINKETEER
talents.description:
You can equip an extra trinket. -1 max Edge.

Probably needs to be redone.

talents.name: VERSATILE CASTING
talents.description: You can have an extra rune displayed.

talents.name: OF MANY MINDS
talents.description: If you spend two knowledge cards in the same turn, look at a number of cards from your deck equal to your exhaustion and put a card into your hand.

talents.name: PRACTICED ABSORPTION
talents.description: When you absorb Anima, you may discard Knowledge to gain 1 extra anima of the same type.

talents.name: QUICK WIT
talents.description:
1/Session
When an enemy flips a Joker for behavior, you may immediately perform 1 action.

talents.name: TIME-BORROWED INSIGHT
talents.description:
Burn Knowledge. Recharge one of your 1/Session abilities.

Could be a Breacher talent?

talents.name: UNIFIED THEORY
talents.description: 1/Session you can spend Anima as though it were Edge.

talents.name: LIFE OF THE PARTY
talents.description:
1/Session
Whenever you Catch Your Breath, you may lower your other allies' exhaustion by 1. Take 1 Strain for each of those allies after the rest.

talents.name: TACTICIAN
talents.description: Spend Social to allow an ally to move 1 zone.

talents.name: UNITED FRONT
talents.description: Whenever you spend Social when another ally is in your zone, you both gain Barrier equal to your Exhaustion.

talents.name: KNOW A GUY
talents.description:
1/Session
You may remember that you have an acquaintance relevant to your needs who's reasonably nearby without spending Edge. GM must approve.

talents.name: COMRADERY
talents.description: Whenever you Catch Your Breath, and you're not alone, you may reset your Strain to -2 instead of 0.

talents.name: TACTICAL STRIKE
talents.description: You may spend a Social to allow an ally to make an attack without spending a card.

talents.name: DO YOU KNOW WHO I AM?!
talents.description:
When you have no Edge, your Social cards count double when negotiating success.

(Probably needs rework)

talents.name: ARCANE UNITY
talents.description: Whenever an ally within range 1 absorbs Anima, you may discard Social to also count as absorbing that Anima.

talents.name: TAG TEAM
talents.description: Deal extra damage to targets equal to the number of other allies engaged with them.

talents.name: THREATENING PRESENCE
talents.description:
1/Session
Enemies within Range 1 become frighted of you for 1 round.

talents.name: PASSIVE INCOME
talents.description:
1/Session
Use wealth without spending Edge.

(Probably needs rework)

talents.name: BURDEN OF STONE
talents.description: When you cast a Terra Aligned spell that effects 1 or more enemies, choose 1 of them. It becomes Slowed until the end of its next turn.

talents.name: RADIANT
talents.description: When you cast a Sol Aligned spell, you may emit a surge of light to deal 1 Sol damage to each other creature in your zone.

talents.name: VEILCRAFT
talents.description: When you cast a Luna Aligned spell targeting a zone, you may shroud one those zones in darkness until the end of your next turn.

talents.name: ANIMA WARD
talents.description: Whenever you cast an Aligned spell, gain 1 Barrier.

talents.name: IMMUTABLE
talents.description: During Terran phase, the first time you take damage each round, gain 2 Barrier.

talents.name: CELERITAS
talents.description: During Solar phase, you gain 1 free action on each of your turns.

talents.name: VORTICAL
talents.description: At the start of your turn during Lunar phase, you may move one creature or object, within Range 1, into your zone. Or engage a creature already in your zone.

talents.name: SUMMON ELEMENTAL
talents.description:
1/Session
Summon an elemental. Choose it's Element when you summon it.

talents.name: RUNIC OVERLOAD
talents.description: When casting a spell, you may use an Intent and Form from the same card without paying Anima. Burn that card.

talents.name: SHAPE ALIGNMENT
talents.description: When you cast an aligned spell, you may override the Form element to match the Intent.

talents.name: VERDANT STRIDE
talents.description: Non-hostile, non-sentient life accommodates your passing. Living obstacles that would hinder another instead passively assist you.

talents.name: VIRTUE'S REWARD
talents.description: Whenever you cast a Life spell that targets your allies, gain a free action this turn.

talents.name: SPIRIT SENSE
talents.description:
When you spend Anima, until the start of your next turn, you gain a special sense with range 2.

Luna: Night vision
Terra:  Tremorsense
Sol: Lifesense

talents.name: LIFE'S ABUNDANCE
talents.description: Whenever you cast a Life spell, you may take 1 Strain to gain 1 Sol Anima.

talents.name: SHAPESHIFT
talents.description:
Channel
You shapeshift into a mundane creature between 1/2 and double your size.

talents.name: RESURGE
talents.description: Whenever a Protect effect is put on you, gain +1 to the next damage you inflict. This bonus doesn't stack.

talents.name: SUMMON SPECTER
talents.description:
1/Session
Summon a specter. Pick either Luna or Sol for its starting form. Paying Luna or Sol for it's upkeep changes it to the corresponding form (no change for Terra).

talents.name: BLOOD MAGIC
talents.description:
1/Turn
Take 1 direct damage. Until the end of your turn, you may use the discarded card to cast a spell.

talents.name: INEXORABLE WILL
talents.description:
1/Session
Recover Strain equal to double your Exhaustion.

talents.name: RAGE
talents.description:
Channel Luna/Sol

Instead of gaining Exhaustion, take damage for each Strain beyond your threshold.
- Luna: Add half your Strain to as extra damage.
- Sol: Recover 1 Strain.

talents.name: ATTITUDE ADJUSTMENT
talents.description: When you cast a Mind spell that affects 1 or more enemies, chose 1 of them. Pick that enemy's behavior for the next round.

talents.name: SELFISH EMPATHY
talents.description: When an enemy damages you, you may take 1 Strain to deal the same damage back.

talents.name: FUELED BY FURY
talents.description: The first time you are damaged each round, gain 1 Luna.

talents.name: PHRENIC INTERFERENCE
talents.description: Whenever you affect an enemy with a Mind spell, you immediately end any effects that it's channeling.

talents.name: DOMINATE MIND
talents.description:
1/Session
You may control any non Elite creature for as long as you Channel this ability. Counts as a Summon.

talents.name: MANTRA GUARD
talents.description: Gain 1 barrier for each effect you're channeling at the end of your turn.

talents.name: MANIC REAPING
talents.description: The First time you deal damage with an attack each round, gain 1 Sol.

talents.name: PARALLEL PROCESSING
talents.description: You may Channel an extra effect concurrently.

talents.name: ANIMA RAGE
talents.description:
While raging if Sol was spent instead reduce strain by [Flip] before you calculate rage damage.

While raging if Luna was spent in addition to the added damage add +1 for every 2 strain above threshold.

talents.name: GLIMPSE THE HORIZON
talents.description: Play with the top card of your spell deck revealed.

talents.name: BRIDGE SPACE
talents.description:
1/Session
Choose a zone within range 3. Your zone and the chosen zone count as 1 zone until the end of your next turn. Creatures chose which zone they're in when the effect ends.

talents.name: FRAME SHIFT
talents.description: When you cast a Warp spell, instead of moving Anima, you may instead flip the phase card.

talents.name: DISTORTION SHIELD
talents.description: Gain Barrier equal to your Exhaustion when you cast a Warp spell.

talents.name: SCULPT THE MOMENT
talents.description: When you cast a Warp spell, you may peek at the top GM card. If you have no stored card, you may set it aside. Spend 1 Terra Anima to use the stored card instead of flipping one.

talents.name: BREACH STEP
talents.description: Whenever you cast a spell that causes you to move or teleport, you may move or teleport an additional zone as part of the effect.

talents.name: DISTORTION STRIKE
talents.description: You deal +1 damage to targets with Barrier.

talents.name: INERTIAL DYNAMO
talents.description: Gain 1 Terra Anima when you end your turn in a different zone from where you started.

talents.name: SPLIT THE SECOND
talents.description:
1/Session
Draw a temporary tableaux. Use it to take an extra turn, then discard it after. Burn any cards used on this turn. You may use this ability at any time (even during an enemy's turn).
